name: Palms Up: Eli's Journey (prototype)
description:
Small project I have been working on with a friend for the last 2 months.

Hope you like it!

If you want us to continue, please leave a comment :-D

-----

Controls:

Mouse click: Move your character and your clones

Space bar: Summon a clone!

Goal:

Press all buttons of each level at the same time, stepping on them with your character and their clones!

(game might be a bit large in size, so it takes some time to download ;-))

Game by Hangarter and Eva
